name: AMERICAN SPEECH-LANGUAGE-HEARING ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Medicare policies in H.R.1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 (P.L.115-123). Reauthorization of the Higher Education Act.
Medicare policies in H.R.1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 (P.L.115-123). Reauthorization of the Higher Education Act.
Medicare policies in H.R.1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 (P.L.115-123).
Reauthorization of the Higher Education Act.
Educating members on the value of speech-language pathology and audiology services and the importance of adequate coverage, including services for Medicare beneficiaries.
